entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:41 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 23.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 25.
